title: Gavin & Stacey's Joanna Page and Mathew Horne reunite for Christmas
description: The pair return to our screens - but, sadly for fans, not for a Christmas special of the hit show.
content:
Gavin & Stacey stars Joanna Page and Mathew Horne have reunited for a Christmas special - but not the one fans hoped for.
Instead, the pair - who played Stacey and Gavin Shipman in the hit TV series - appear in a short festive supermarket advert, enj... [1216 chars]

title: DNA identifies suspected killer 20 years after Jennifer Kiely found dead on Eastbourne seafront
description: DNA obtained last year was the "final piece of the puzzle" and led to Keith Dowbekin officially being made a suspect. Police now say they're confident he was the killer.
content:
A suspected murderer has been named 20 years after a woman was stabbed multiple times and her body set on fire.
Jennifer Kiely, 35, was found with a pushchair on top of her in a seafront shelter in Eastbourne, East Sussex, on 22 January 2005.
The att... [2336 chars]

title: House Democrats release new images of Epstein’s private Caribbean island
description: Images and videos taken in 2020, a year after he died in jail, show the late sex offender’s home
content:
House Democrats released a handful of photos and videos from Jeffrey Epstein’s private Caribbean island on Wednesday, offering a rare glimpse into a secretive place where Epstein is alleged to have trafficked young girls.

title: Maro Itoje eyes World Cup glory after England dodge big guns in 2027 draw
description: Maro Itoje has set his sights on Rugby World Cup glory in Australia in 2027 after England were handed a favourable potential path through the tournament
content:
Maro Itoje has set his sights on Rugby World Cup glory in Australia in 2027 after England were handed a favourable potential path through the tournament when the draw was made in Sydney on Wednesday.

title: Israel receives coffin that Hamas says contains Gaza hostage's body
description: The remains, which Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad say were found in northern Gaza, will be taken to Tel Aviv for forensic tests.
content:
Israel has received via the Red Cross a coffin which Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad (PIJ) say contains the body of one of the last two deceased hostages still in Gaza, according to the Israeli prime minister's office.
